name: garbled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If words or messages are garbled, they are not clear and are very difficult to understand, often giving a false idea of the facts: garbled message There was a strange garbled message on my voicemail. Synonyms
confused
disconnected
disjointed
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Confusion, confusing and feeling confused
addled
all of a doodah idiom
all over the place idiom
alphabet soup
at sea idiom
dazedly
Delphic
disarray
discombobulation
disordered
muddle
muddle something up
muddle-headed
muddled
mush
turmoil
unaccountable
unaccountably
unexplained
unsearchable
See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of something said) confused and unclear, or giving a false idea: He left a garbled message on my answering machine.
